text: Cole Younger, Gunfighter is a 1958 American western movie. It was directed by R. G. Springsteen. The movie is based on the 1950 novel The Desperado by Clifton Adams. Actors include Frank Lovejoy, James Best, Abby Dalton, Jan Merlin, Frank Ferguson, and Ainslie Pryor. It was distributed by Allied Artists Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Cole Younger, Gunfighter
